name: Post Work Man
description:
Post Work Man is a die and retry  game, kind of relaxing but idk, it's more like "Calm and hardcore", just try it and you'll understand.

You jump from roof to roof, you listen to nice musics, you're a guy coming back from work. There are some nice visuals, nice places etc.

Controls :

  • WASD or ZQSD to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Left click to teleport
  • Right click to cancel teleportation while left click
  • E to take your smartphone
  • Esc or P for the pause menu

There are some controllers inputs too but ... if you play this game with a controller you'll probably do whatever.

Just launch, play, explore, teleport, find your way home, win the game and see the time it took you to do it, retry to do your best time, ask a friend to try to beat your time, realize that your friend is really better than you, retry, explore to try to find secret paths to beat your friend, beat him, listen your friend yelling that you're a hacker, show him some secret paths to prove you're innocent, see that your friend is a really better player than you and realize that you will not beat him whatever you do, ask another friend to play (a friend who is a bigger noob than you), beat him, show your domination (he probably thinks that you have a giant cucumber now), repeat the operation with all your friends.

I think I went too far, maybe ? Let me know.

Here's my tipeee if you want : https://fr.tipeee.com/texz/

I love you guys :)
